name: com.cavrnus.csc
description: Cavrnus enhances 3D workflows by providing developers a seamless drag-and-drop toolkit for embedding collaborative features directly into Unity projects.

samples.description: Essential prefabs and scenes to get started quickly.
Example showing how to swap and sync avatars during runtime.
Demonstrates how to use Tags in order to join multiple spaces concurrently and rejoin spaces.
Example providing a simple loader that loads provided URLs and applies as textures.
Example illustrating how to synchronize all properties of a material with a single script.
Examples demonstrating how user streams can be used on textures.
Example providing a functional library to upload and download content. ImageLoader provided as example.
